awakenings.effect: After taking damage, additionally gain 1 stack of [Fortitude]
When [Fortitude] reaches 30 stacks, all allies get the same shield & damage-reduction as your Ultimate (60 % DEF shield + 24 % damage reduction for 10 s) Can only happen once per battle.
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
All resistance increased by 15%, Wind resistance additionally increased by 15%

effects: After using ultimate skill, equipped character takes 10% less damage for 5 seconds
Shield amount applied by ultimate skills increased by 20%
memoryCard.name: Her Trainer

auto.description: Deals Wind damage equal to 120% of own defense to target enemy, and reduces damage taken by self for 10 seconds by 24%.
auto.name: Divine Shield Wind

normal.description: Deals Wind damage equal to 120% of own defense to target enemy.
normal.name: Shield Impact

passive.description: After taking damage, gain 1 stack of [Fortitude], increasing own defense by 4.8%, max 30 stacks.
passive.name: Aethyss's Call for Help

ultimate.description: All allied characters gain a shield equal to 60% of your defense(Penny), and take 24% less damage for 10 seconds.
ultimate.name: Shield of Aethyss

teamSkill.description: Own defense increases by 15%. At battle start, every 500 defense reduces team damage taken by 1.5%, max 6 times.
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
